name: Seed Up: A fast paced farming game
name_original: Seed Up: A fast paced farming game
description:
A game for the Great Autumn Game Jam: 2021.

With the Mayor's demand for an outstanding amount of pumpkins, will you be able to feed his greed? You have one month to get the Mayor as many pumpkins as possible. Will you cower in fear or Seed Up?

Game lasts about 6 minutes and is simply how many pumpkins can you harvest in the time allotted. There are some special "features" and "technique" that was not a bug/ unintended. There is also some special text if you are good at the game. Post screenshots of high scores :)
